name: The Other Side of the Tomb
name_original: The Other Side of the Tomb
description:
It has been a few years since you moved back to Egypt now. Get to research ecology in the ruined pyramids has not only been your biggest dream but the works are so therapeutic,  it also made you feel so much better. In many surprising ways, it also helps you reconnect to the homeland and its spirits. 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Context Sensitive (see sheets below)

ESCAPE // Clicking Ankh - Opens Menu

_______________________________________________

Hint :

When you Unlock Abilities (by collecting the Glowing Seeds) you will have to return to the lab to equip them on your "Nilespedia" (the menu)

__

There is no "end" condition, but the closest thing we have is if you can explore all 4 major zones and collect all the animal abilities.

*Sorry for any confusion we tried our best 😔
